<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Public Filings, Policies and Procedures:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee is responsible for:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	ensuring adequate procedures are in
	place for the review of the Company&rsquo;s disclosure of financial information extracted
	or derived from the Company&rsquo;s financial statements and periodically assess the
	Company&rsquo;s disclosure controls and procedures, and management&rsquo;s evaluation
	thereof, to ensure that financial information is recorded, processed, summarized and
	reported within the time periods required by law;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	reviewing disclosures made to the Committee
	by the Chief Executive Officer and the Chief Financial Officer during their certification
	process for any significant deficiencies in the design or operation of internal controls
	or material weaknesses therein and any fraud involving management or other employees
	who have a significant role in internal controls;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	reviewing with management and the external
	auditor any correspondence with securities regulators or other regulatory or government
	agencies which raise material issues regarding the Company&rsquo;s financial reporting
	or accounting policies; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	regularly reviewing with management,
	the external auditors and the Company&rsquo;s legal counsel, any claim or other contingency,
	including tax assessments, that could have a material effect upon the financial position
	or operating results of the Company and the manner in which these matters have been disclosed
	in the financial statements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	External Auditors
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The responsibilities and duties of the
	Committee as they relate to the external auditor are to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	consider and make recommendations to
	the Board with respect to the external auditor to be nominated for appointment by shareholders
	at each annual general meeting of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review the performance of the external
	auditor and, where appropriate, recommend to the Board the removal of the external auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	confirm the independence and effectiveness
	of the external auditor, which will require receipt from the external auditor of a formal
	written statement delineating all relationships between the auditor and the Company and
	any other factors that might affect the independence of the auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	oversee the work of the external auditor
	generally, and review and report to the Board on the planning and results of external
	audit work, including:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	i.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the external auditor&rsquo;s engagement
	letter or other reports of the auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	ii.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the reasonableness of the estimated
	fees and other compensation to be paid to the external auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	iii.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the form and content of the quarterly
	and annual audit report, which should include,
<I>
	inter alia
</I>
	:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	a
	summary of the Company&rsquo;s internal controls and procedures;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 81PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	any
	material issues raised in the most recent meeting of the Committee; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 81PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 58.5PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	any
	other related audit, review or attestation services performed for the Company by the
	external auditors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 81PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 101; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	A-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 81PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -22.5PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	actively engage in dialogue with the
	external auditor with respect to any disclosed relationships or services that may affect
	the independence and objectivity of the external auditor and take, or recommend that
	the Board take, appropriate actions to oversee the independence of the external auditor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review and pre-approve all non-audit
	services provided to the Company or its subsidiaries by the external auditor prior to
	the commencement of such services and pre-approval of non-audit services will be satisfied
	only if the requirements as set out in
<I>
	National Instrument 52-110 &ldquo;Audit Committees&rdquo;
</I>
	are satisfied;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	monitor the relationship between management
	and the external auditor and resolve any disagreements between them regarding financial
	reporting;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	h.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	engage the external auditor in discussions
	regarding any amendments to critical accounting policies and practices; alternative treatments
	of financial information within generally accepted accounting principles related to material
	items that have been discussed with management, including any potential ramifications
	and the preferred treatment by the independent auditor; and lastly, written communication
	between management and the independent auditor, including but not limited to, the management
	letter and schedules of adjusted and unadjusted differences, as applicable.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Internal Controls and Financial Reporting
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee will:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	obtain reasonable assurance from discussions
	with (and/or reports from) management, and reports from external and internal auditors
	that the Company&rsquo;s financial and accounting systems are reliable and that the prescribed
	internal controls are operating effectively;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in consultation with the external auditor,
	the CEO, the CFO, and where necessary, other members of management, review the integrity
	of the Company&rsquo;s financial reporting process and the internal control structure;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review the acceptability of the Company&rsquo;s
	accounting principles and direct the auditors&rsquo; examinations to particular areas
	of question or concern, as required;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	request the auditors to undertake special
	examinations (e.g., review compliance with conflict of interest policies) when it deems
	necessary;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	together with management, review control
	weaknesses identified by the external and internal auditors;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review the appointments of the chief
	financial officer and key financial executives;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	ensure CEO and CFO certifications pursuant
	to Sarbanes-Oxley Act sections 302 and 906 and pursuant to Canadian securities laws are
	prepared and filed and will make inquiry and initiate discussion as necessary with management
	regarding the practices and procedures adopted to permit management&rsquo;s assurance
	on the underlying controls; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	h.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	during the annual audit process, consider
	if any significant matters regarding the Company&rsquo;s internal controls and procedures
	over financial reporting, including any significant deficiencies or material weaknesses
	in their design or operation, need to be discussed with the external auditor, and review
	whether internal control recommendations made by the auditor have been implemented by
	management.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 102; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Internal Audit
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee shall be responsible for
	reviewing:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	activities, organization structure
	and qualifications of the internal audit function;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the resources, budget, reporting relationships
	and planned activities of the internal audit function;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	internal audit findings and determine
	that they are being properly followed up;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the internal audit procedures and recommending
	changes, if any; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the adequacy of the line of communication
	between internal audit and the Committee, ensuring that it is maintained.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Ethical and Legal Compliance and Risk Management
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The responsibilities and duties of the
	Committee as they relate to compliance and risk management are to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	satisfy itself as to the integrity
	of the CEO and other senior management and that the CEO and other senior management strive
	to create a culture of integrity throughout the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review the adequacy, appropriateness
	and effectiveness of the Company&rsquo;s policies and business practices which impact
	on the integrity, financial and otherwise, of the Company, including those relating to
	hedging, insurance, accounting, information services and systems, financial controls
	and management reporting;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	receive a report from management on
	tax issues and planning, including compliance with the Company&rsquo;s source deduction
	obligations and other remittances under applicable tax or other legislation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	receive a report on the annual policy
	attestation process for the Company&rsquo;s Global Code of Ethical Conduct (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Code
</B>
	&rdquo;)
	and Global Anti-Corruption Policy;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review annually the adequacy and quality
	of the Company&rsquo;s financial and accounting staffing, including the need for and
	scope of internal audit reviews (if any);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	receiving reports from management and
	other Board committees, including without limitation the Health Safety, Environment and
	Community Committee, on the identification, assessment and management of risks;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in conjunction with any other committee
	designated by the Board from time to time, reviewing major financial, audit and accounting
	related risks and the policies, guidelines and mechanisms that management has put in
	place to govern the process of monitoring, controlling and reporting such risks;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	h.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	establish procedures for:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	i.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	the
	receipt, retention and treatment of complaints received by the Company regarding accounting,
	internal controls, or auditing matters; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	ii.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	the
	confidential, anonymous submission by employees of the Company of concerns regarding
	questionable accounting or auditing matters.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	i.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review any complaints and concerns
	received regarding accounting, internal controls, or auditing matters or with respect
	to the Code, and the investigation and resolution thereof, and provide all relevant information
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 103; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	A-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	5
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	relating
	to such complaints and concerns to the Nominating and Governance Committee, taking into account complainant confidentiality concerns
	and the roles and responsibilities of each Committee;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	j.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review and monitor the Company&rsquo;s
	compliance with applicable legal and regulatory requirements related to financial reporting
	and disclosure;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	k.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	review all related-party transactions;
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	l.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	carry the responsibility for reviewing
	reports from management, internal and external auditors with respect to the Company&rsquo;s
	compliance with the laws and regulations having a material impact on financial reporting
	and disclosure, including: tax and financial reporting laws and regulations; legal withholding
	requirements; environmental protection laws and regulations; and any other laws and regulations
	which expose directors to liability.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	AUTHORITY
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee shall have the authority
	to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	i.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	engage independent counsel and
	other advisors as it determines necessary to carry out its duties;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	ii.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	set and pay the compensation for
	any advisors employed by the Committee; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	iii.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	communicate directly with the
	internal and external auditors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee shall have the power,
	authority and discretion delegated to it by the Board which shall not include the power
	to change the membership of or fill vacancies in the Committee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A resolution approved in writing by
	the members of the Committee shall be valid and effective as if it had been passed at
	a duly called meeting. Such resolution shall be filed with the minutes of the proceedings
	of the Committee and shall be effective on the date stated thereon or on the latest date
	stated in any counterpart.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Board shall have the power at any
	time to revoke or override the authority given to or acts done by the Committee except
	as to acts done before such revocation or act of overriding and to terminate the appointment
	or change the membership of the Committee or fill vacancies in it as it shall see fit.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee shall have unrestricted
	and unfettered access to all Company personnel and documents and shall be provided with
	the resources necessary to carry out its responsibilities.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	f.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At the invitation of the Chair, one
	or more officers or employees of the Company may, and if required by the Committee, shall
	attend a meeting of the Committee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	g.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Committee, upon approval by a majority
	of the members of the Committee, may delegate certain of its duties and responsibilities
	to subcommittees of the Committee, which must report back to the full Committee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	DEFINITIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Capitalized terms used in this Charter
	and not otherwise defined have the meaning attributed to them below:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Financially Literate
</B>
	&rdquo;
	means the ability to read and understand a set of financial statements that present a breadth and level of complexity of accounting
	issues that are generally comparable to the breadth and complexity of the issues that can reasonably be expected to be raised
	in the Company&rsquo;s financial statements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 104; VALUE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	A-
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	6
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Committee Financial Expert
</B>
	&rdquo;
	means a person who has the following attributes:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	a.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an understanding of generally accepted
	accounting principles and financial statements;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	b.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the ability to assess the general application
	of such principles in connection with the accounting for estimates, accruals and reserves;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	c.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	experience preparing, auditing, analyzing
	or evaluating financial statements that present a breadth and level of complexity of
	accounting issues that are generally comparable to the breadth and level of complexity
	of issues that can reasonably be expected to be raised in the Company&rsquo;s financial
	statements, or experience actively supervising one or more persons engaged in such activities;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	d.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an understanding of internal controls
	and procedures for financial reporting; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
	e.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an understanding of audit committee
	functions; acquired through any one or more of the following:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	i.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	education
	and experience as a principal financial officer, principal accounting officer, controller,
	public accountant or auditor or experience in one or more positions that involve the
	performance of similar functions;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	ii.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	experience
	actively supervising a principal financial officer, principal accounting officer, controller,
	public accountant, auditor or person performing similar functions; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT VERDANA, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	iii.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: CALIBRI, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
	experience
	overseeing or assessing the performance of companies or public accountants with respect
	to the preparation, auditing or evaluation of financial statements; or other relevant
	experience.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 17PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
<B>
	Management&rsquo;s
	Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	March 24, 2016
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 16PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	Introduction
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Management&rsquo;s Discussion and Analysis
	(&ldquo;MD&amp;A&rdquo;) is intended to help the reader understand the significant factors that have affected the performance of
	Pan American Silver Corp. and its subsidiaries (collectively &ldquo;Pan American&rdquo;, &ldquo;we&rdquo;, &ldquo;us&rdquo;, &ldquo;our&rdquo;
	or the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) and such factors that may affect its future performance. This MD&amp;A should be read in conjunction
	with the Company&rsquo;s Audited Consolidated Financial Statements for the year ended December 31, 2015 (the &ldquo;2015 Financial
	Statements&rdquo;) and the related notes contained therein. All amounts in this MD&amp;A and in the 2015 Financial Statements are
	expressed in United States dollars (&ldquo;USD&rdquo;), unless identified otherwise. The Company reports its financial position,
	results of operations and casflows in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards as issued by the International
	Accounting Standards Board (&ldquo;IFRS&rdquo;). Pan American&rsquo;s significant accounting policies are set out in Note 2 of
	the 2015 Financial Statements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This MD&amp;A refers to various non-Generally Accepted
	Accounting Principles (&ldquo;non-GAAP&rdquo;) measures, such as &ldquo;all-in sustaining cost per silver ounce sold&quot;, &ldquo;cash
	costs per ounce of silver&rdquo;, &ldquo;working capital&rsquo;, &ldquo;general and administrative cost per silver ounce produced&rdquo;,
	&ldquo;adjusted earnings&rdquo; and &ldquo;basic adjusted earnings per share&rdquo;, which are used by the Company to manage and
	evaluate operating performance at each of the Company&rsquo;s mines and are widely reported in the mining industry as benchmarks
	for performance, but do not have standardized meaning. To facilitate a better understanding of these non-GAAP measures as calculated
	by the Company, additional information has been provided in this MD&amp;A. Please refer to the section of this MD&amp;A entitled
	&ldquo;Alternative Performance (Non-GAAP) Measures&rdquo; for a detailed description of &ldquo;all-in sustaining cost per silver
	ounce sold&rdquo;, &ldquo;cash costs per ounce of silver&rdquo;, &ldquo;working capital&rdquo;, &ldquo;general and administrative
	cost per silver ounce produced&rdquo;, &ldquo;adjusted earnings&ldquo; and &ldquo;basic adjusted earnings per share&rdquo;, as
	well as details of the Company&rsquo;s by-product credits and a reconciliation of these measures to the 2015 Financial Statements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any reference to &ldquo;cash costs&rdquo; or &ldquo;cash
	costs per ounce of silver&rdquo; in this MD&amp;A should be understood to mean cash costs per ounce of silver, net of by-product
	credits.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Except for historical information contained
	in this MD&amp;A, the following disclosures are forward-looking statements within the meaning of the U.S. Private Securities Litigation
	Reform Act of 1995 and forward-looking information within the meaning of applicable Canadian provincial securities laws or are
	future oriented financial information and as such are based on an assumed set of economic conditions and courses of action. Please
	refer to the cautionary note regarding forward-looking statements and information at the back of this MD&amp;A and the &ldquo;Risks
	Related to Pan American&rsquo;s Business&rdquo; contained in the Company&rsquo;s most recent Annual Information Form on file with
	the Canadian provincial securities regulatory authorities and Form 40-F on file with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission
	(the &ldquo;SEC&rdquo;). Additional information about Pan American and its business activities, including its Annual Information
	Form, is available on SEDAR at
<U>
	www.sedar.com
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	Pan American Silver Corp.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage117"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 16PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	Core Business and Strategy
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Pan American engages in silver mining and related activities,
	including exploration, mine development, extraction, processing, refining and reclamation. The Company owns and operates silver
	mines located in Peru, Mexico, Argentina, and Bolivia. In addition, the Company is exploring for new silver deposits and opportunities
	throughout North and South America. The Company is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (&ldquo;TSX&rdquo;) (Symbol: PAA) and on
	the Nasdaq Global Select Market (&ldquo;NASDAQ&rdquo;) in New York (Symbol: PAAS).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
	Pan
	American&rsquo;s vision is
<B>
<I>
	to be the world&rsquo;s pre-eminent silver producer, with a reputation for excellence in discovery,
	engineering, innovation and sustainable development
</I>
</B>
	. To achieve this vision, we base our business on the following strategy:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL,SANS-SERIF">
<I>
	Generate sustainable profits and superior returns
	on investments through the safe, efficient and environmentally sound development and operation of silver assets
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 22.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL,SANS-SERIF">
<I>
	Constantly replace and grow our mineable silver
	reserves and resources through targeted near-mine exploration and global business development
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 22.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL,SANS-SERIF">
<I>
	Foster positive long term relationships with our
	employees, our shareholders, our communities and our local governments through open and honest communication and ethical and sustainable
	business practices
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 22.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL,SANS-SERIF">
<I>
	Continually search for opportunities to upgrade
	and improve the quality of our silver assets both internally and through acquisition
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 22.5PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 13.5PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: ARIAL,SANS-SERIF">
<I>
	Encourage our employees to be innovative, responsive
	and entrepreneurial throughout our entire organization
</I>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To execute this strategy, Pan American has assembled
	a sector leading team of mining professionals with a depth of knowledge and experience in all aspects of our business that allows
	the Company to confidently advance early stage projects through construction and into operation.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Pan American is determined to conduct its business in
	a responsible and sustainable manner. Caring for the environment in which we operate, contributing to the long-term development
	of our host communities and ensuring that our employees can work in a safe and secure manner are core values at Pan American. We
	are committed to maintaining positive relations with our employees, the local communities and the government agencies, all of whom
	we view as partners in our enterprise.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 16PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	2015 HIGHLIGHTS AND KEY NOTES
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 16PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	OperationS &amp; PROJECT DEVELOPMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Record Silver Production of 26.12 Million Ounces
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Pan American produced a record 26.12 million ounces
	of silver in 2015, compared to the 26.11 million ounces of silver produced in 2014. The 2015 production was achieved through production
	increases at La Colorada, Dolores, Huaron, and San Vicente, which offset production declines at Alamo Dorado, Morococha and Manantial
	Espejo.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Record Gold Production of 183.7 Thousand Ounces
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company set a new annual gold production
	record in 2015, producing 183.7 thousand ounces of gold, a 22.2 thousand or 14% increase from 2014. This was achieved through record
	production levels at Dolores, Alamo Dorado and Manantial Espejo.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Reduced Annual Cash Costs Lower than Forecast
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Despite substantially lower by-product metal prices,
	the Company recorded consolidated cash costs, net of by-product credits, of $9.70 per payable ounce of silver, a 15% reduction
	from 2014 cash costs of $11.46 per payable ounce of silver, lower than initial 2015 forecast of $10.80 to $11.80 per ounce and
	lower than the November 12, 2015 revised 2015 full year forecast of $10.00 to $10.50 per payable ounce of silver. The 2015 decrease
	was due to higher gold production, record-breaking consolidated copper production, as well as substantially lower unit operating
	costs per tonne at all of the Company&rsquo;s mines.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Progress on the La Colorada &amp; Dolores Expansion Projects
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Substantial progress was made on the La Colorada mine
	expansion project during 2015 with approximately 50% of the new shaft, and 70% of the new sulphide processing plant being completed
	at year-end 2015. Overall, the La Colorada expansion is advancing on budget and remains on schedule to reach the planned 1,800
	tonnes-per-day ore production rate by the end of 2017.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Dolores mine expansion projects also
	advanced well in 2015, including: the commencement of engineering work on the new agglomeration plant, with construction expected
	to commence in the first half of 2016; advancing the underground ramp a total of 866 metres; and advancing the new high voltage
	power-line to the site to approximately 74% completion by year-end 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	Financial
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<B>
<I>
	Reduced Annual All-in Sustaining Costs per Silver Ounce Sold Lower than Forecast
</I>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Consolidated annual all-in sustaining costs
	per silver ounce sold net of by-product credits (&ldquo;AISCSOS&rdquo;) of $14.92 was lower than the initial 2015 forecast of $15.50
	to $16.50, lower than the revised full year 2015 guidance issued on November 12, 2015 of $15.00 to $15.50, and was 17% lower than
	2014 AISCSOS. This reduction in AISCSOS was achieved through lower sustaining capital expenditures, lower net realizable value
	adjustments to inventories, lower direct operating costs, and higher by-product production offsetting lower by-product metal prices.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: ITALIC BOLD 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL; FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Strong Liquidity and Working Capital Position, and Continued Returns to Shareholders
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Company had cash and short-term investment balances
	of $226.6 million and working capital of $392.2 million as at December 31, 2015. The Company had total debt outstanding of
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 5; VALUE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 2PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT: 10PT ARIAL, HELVETICA, SANS-SERIF">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%">
	Pan American Silver Corp.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 34%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	5
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage119"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	$59.8 million at the end of 2015. The Company&rsquo;s
	$300.0 million revolving credit facility, established in the second quarter of 2015, had a $263.8 million undrawn and available
	balance to the Company as of December 31, 2015. The Company&rsquo;s strong balance sheet and positive operating cash flow facilitated
	the continued return of value to shareholders in the three months ended December 31, 2015 (&ldquo;Q4 2015&rdquo;) by way of $7.6
	million in dividend payments.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Financial Results
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
<B>
<I>
	&nbsp;
</I>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	A net loss of $231.6 million was recorded in 2015, which
	corresponds to a basic loss per share of $1.49. The majority of the net loss was due to non-cash impairment charges on certain
	mineral properties, plant and equipment assets. Mine operating losses incurred in 2015 were primarily attributable to lower realized
	metal prices partially offset by increased sales volumes and positive variances in production costs. Cash flow from operations
	remained strong in 2015, generating $88.7 million.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	2015 Impairment Charges to Mine Assets
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As a result of further declines in metal prices in 2015,
	the Company reduced its long-term reserve metal price outlooks and triggered total after-tax impairment charges of $106.0 million
	in 2015 relating to the Company&rsquo;s valuation of the Morococha, Dolores, Manantial Espejo and Alamo Dorado mines.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 16PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE">
	2016 Operating Outlook
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 11PT ARIAL,SANS-SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	These estimates are forward-looking statements and information
	that are subject to the cautionary note associated with forward-looking statements and information at the end of this MD&amp;A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN,SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
